overview: Through a remarkable modern dance program featuring the choreography of Hwai-min Lin and the dynamic music of Arvo Part, the Cloud Gate Dance Theatre of Taiwan pays tribute to bamboo, a symbol of integrity and elegance in many Eastern cultures. With Bamboo Dream, dance genius Hwai-min Lin directs his talented performers to engage in a vigorous manner, instead of his usual drawn-out, balletic style.
title: Bamboo Dream
